Reference

Package information

drvid-package

drvid: Access to 'DVID' API

All functions

dv_conn()

Make a connection to DVID server

read.neuron.dvid() read.neurons.dvid()

Read a single neuron in skeleton format from DVID server

dv_bodyid_at_xyz()

Get the bodyid for a volumetric segmentation that covers a given point/points in space

dv_get_annotations()

Retrieve annotations for bodyids

dv_get_segmentation_info()

Get information about a segmentation

dv_get_user_bookmarks()

Retrieve user bookmarks for a neuTu user from a DVID server

dv_get_voxels() dv_get_mesh()

Get a mesh or voxel data for a given bodyid
